solution_line_template: Evelyn takes {days_off_per_week} days a week off from work, so she is at work {days_in_a_week} - {days_off_per_week} = <<{days_in_a_week}-{days_off_per_week}={work_days_per_week}>>{work_days_per_week} days a week.
Thus, she uses {total_sheets_per_pad} / {work_days_per_week} = <<{total_sheets_per_pad}/{work_days_per_week}={sheets_per_day}>>{sheets_per_day} sheets of paper per day at work.
